alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 12:31PM AKDT until October 26 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to start late Tuesday night, but will gradually change over to rain through Wednesday morning. Highest accumulations will be on the Haines Highway. The town of Haines may stay warm enough for more of a mix rather then all snow so accumulation could be significantly less there.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
